name: Butterflyeffects_test
description: The butterfly effect is a narrative adventure video game. This game inspired by a famous theory called butterfly effect from climate scientists. It means a very small change in starting condition can lead to vastly different outcomes. in my game, the player travels from present to the past to find the small inducement that leads to the incident. Player advents in the story protagonist's life and find the clue of what happened in the present time and go back to the day that incident happen and change.
